import React from 'react' import {FaCaretRight} from 'react-icons/fa' import {BsInfoCircle} from 'react-icons/bs' const Featured = ({type}) => { return (
{type && (
{type === "movie" ? "Movies" : "Series"}
)}

) } export default Featured
